Welcome to Appvault’s documentation!¶

Appvault Device Module¶

A proof-of-concept code for running on an external Python device (Raspberry pi)

copyright:None
license:TODO

Appvault Client Module¶

A client program to use with an Appvault device

copyright:None
license:TODO
class client.appvault.Communicator(port=None)[source]¶

Represents a serial channel for external communications.

port: Serial
The serial port over which to communicate.
read_id_and_bytes()[source]¶

Returns a tuple of (identifier, task_bytes)

client.appvault.encrypt(infile, outfile, comms=None)[source]¶

Encrypts a file and stores on the host machine.

infile: os.PathLike
The name of the file to be encrypted.
outfile: os.PathLike
The name that the encrypted file should be saved as.
comms: Optional[Communicator]
The Communicator to use when transferring and receiving data. Defaults to user input.
TimeoutError
More data was expected in response from the device but not received in time.
client.appvault.run(infile, comms=None, return_result=False)[source]¶

Runs an encrypted file on the external Appvault device.

infile: os.PathLike
The name of the encrypted file to be executed.
comms: Optional[Communicator]
The Communicator to use when transferring and receiving data. Defaults to user input.
return_result: Optional[bool]
If True, return the result of the program, else print the result.
TimeoutError
More data was expected in response from the device but not received in time.
ValueError
Part of the response from the device does not match expected response.
